    • saveSetupFile

      public static boolean saveSetupFile​(java.io.File file, boolean template)
      Method saves simulation.crafts to save file.
      Parameters:
      file - file to load.
      template - if templates should be saved into the file.
      Returns:
      true if everything went correctly.

    • loadSetupFile

      public static boolean loadSetupFile​(java.io.File file)
      Method loads saved file.
      Parameters:
      file - file to load.
      Returns:
      simulation.crafts loaded.

    • loadTemplatesFile

      public static java.util.LinkedList<Craft> loadTemplatesFile​(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Method reads formatted craft csv file.
      Parameters:
      path - path to the file to import.
      Returns:
      set containing all weapon templates from the file.

    • filterSystems

      public static void filterSystems​(java.util.LinkedList<AbstractSystem> list, java.util.LinkedList<Weapon> weapons, java.util.LinkedList<Countermeasure> cm)
      Method filter input list and arranges simulation.crafts.systems to their categories.
      Parameters:
      list - simulation.crafts.systems unsorted list.
      weapons - weapons list.
      cm - countermeasure list.

    • loadSystemsFile

      public static java.util.LinkedList<AbstractSystem> loadSystemsFile​(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Method reads simulation.crafts.systems file formatted in style:

      Weapon_type name damage min_range max_range EraYYYY target:target:target ammo_speed:ammo_mass:ammo_calibre/guidance_type OR Enum_CM_Type name strength min_range max_range EraYYYY

      Parameters:
      path - path to the file to import.
      Returns:
      set containing all weapon templates from the file.
